option.name: nd_booking_paypal_message_checkout
option.value: Wait the automatic return to the site to complete the transaction.

option.name: nd_booking_booking_request_message_checkout
option.value: This request is not a reservation but a simple request, we will get in touch with you.

option.name: nd_booking_bank_transfer_message_checkout
option.value: Your reservation will be confirmed when we receive the bank transfer.

option.name: nd_booking_payment_on_arrive_message_checkout
option.value: You could pay directly in our structure with any kind of credit card or cash.

option.name: nd_booking_stripe_checkout
option.value: Simple and safe. Make payments with any type of credit card.

option.name: nd_rst_general_description
option.value: Make sure you reserve your table by leaving a deposit or send a simple booking request that can be confirmed by the owner. Leaving the deposit is very quick, simple and safe.

option.name: nd_rst_br_description
option.value: Send a simple booking request and wait for confirmation from the restaurant manager.

option.name: nd_rst_stripe_description
option.value: Enter your credit card informations to confirm the deposit.

option.name: nd_rst_paypal_description
option.value: Wait the automatic return to the site to confirm the table reservation. Transaction will be manage by Paypal.
